The Annual Briefings gather people, as one collective brain, honing single acts—exploring new typologies—as ongoing responses to our evolving public environment. Learn more SUMMIT By Snøhetta SUMMIT is humble, prioritising a warm, soft surface, natural shapes and intuitive playfulness without embellishment.
